text: Fredrik Flo (born 10 October 1996) is a Norwegian footballer who plays for Øygarden. ==Career== In the second half of 2016 he was loaned out to Fana. He is the son of Håvard Flo. He was loaned out to Bryne in 2017 and Fana again in 2018. In 2019 he transferred to Sotra. In 2020 he transferred to Øygarden. ==Personal life== He is the son of former Werder Bremen and Wolverhampton Wanderers striker Håvard Flo. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="4" |Sogndal |2015 |rowspan="1" |OBOS-ligaen |2||0||1||1||colspan="2"|-||3||1 |- |2016 |rowspan="1" |Tippeligaen |1||0||2||2||colspan="2"|-||3||2 |- |2017 |rowspan="1" |Eliteserien |2||0||1||0||colspan="2"|-||3||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !5!!0!!4!!3!!-!!-!!9!!3 |- |rowspan="3" |Fana (loan) |2016 |rowspan="1" |PostNord-ligaen |11||5||0||0||colspan="2"|-||11||5 |- |2018 |rowspan="1" |Norsk Tipping-ligaen |24||5||1||0||colspan="2"|-||25||5 |- !colspan="2"|Total !35!!10!!1!!0!!-!!-!!36!!10 |- |rowspan="2" |Bryne (loan) |2017 |rowspan="1" |PostNord-ligaen |9||0||0||0||colspan="2"|-||9||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !9!!0!!0!!0!!-!!-!!9!!0 |- |rowspan="2" |Sotra |2019 |rowspan="1" |PostNord-ligaen |22||3||2||0||colspan="2"|-||24||3 |- !colspan="2"|Total !22!!3!!2!!0!!-!!-!!24!!3 |- |rowspan="2" |Øygarden |2020 |rowspan="1" |OBOS-ligaen |17||0||0||0||colspan="2"|-||17||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !17!!0!!0!!0!!-!!-!!17!!0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !88!!13!!7!!3!!-!!-!!95!!16 |} ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian footballers Category:Norwegian First Division players Category:Eliteserien players Category:Sogndal Fotball players Category:Fana IL players Category:Bryne FK players Category:Association football forwards
